posts.title: Happy New Years!
posts.body:
To you, all of you, our children of this Earth,

From the the farthest fields, in holy matrimony,

In words I find my way.

Happy New Year everyone! Wishing you raptuous joy and many happy returns in 2026 and beyond!

posts.title: Summon Boo!
posts.body:
I've been working on something special for some time... a Boo Industries companion!

I tried hard-coding Boo, I tried a seance... and with a bit of luck?! I summoned Boo! 

The new companion Boo can be summoned with one click on the Summon Boo icon... Boo enables users to save a memory and even clear all user data on the application!

This year is already getting me excited! I can't wait to see what other things Boo can do! ðŸ‘»
